document.full_text: henrik zetterberg and valtteri filppula scored less than two minutes apart in the third period, and the red wings forced a decisive seventh game after trailing 3-0 in the series.
document.title: roundup | red wings 3, sharks 1: red wings rally and force game 7
lines_and_colors: henrik zetterberg and valtteri filppula scored less than two minutes apart in the third period, and the red wings forced a decisive seventh game after trailing 3-0 in the series.
